rows.label: tlk70000073_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Lost my comrades in the midst of
battle when I least expected...

rows.label: tlk70000073_01_msg0002
rows.name:
If that happens to you, get to your
downed friend and lend 'em a hand.

rows.label: tlk70000073_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Keep the esprit de corps high and
you shouldn't have any problems
keeping your party members standing.

rows.label: tlk70000073_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But if your team's lost the will
to fight, sorry to say but there's
not much hope for you.

rows.label: tlk70000073_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And remember, a revived ally won't
be back at full strength, so don't
forget to lend 'em a hand.

rows.label: tlk70000073_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Just a couple of hints to keep you
going. Take care of your friends,
and they'll take care of you.
